snippet: Rahul Gandhi, the heir apparent of an Indian political dynasty, has been reluctant to step into the spotlight.
abstract: Rahul Gandhi, heir apparent of an Indian dynasty, has been reluctant to step into the political spotlight as his country undergoes a period of political uncertainty; Ghandi has long been groomed by his mother Sonia, president of the ruling National Congress Party, but his reclusive nature is throwing his once-promising career into doubt.
lead_paragraph: Rahul Gandhi, the heir apparent of an Indian political dynasty, has been reluctant to step into the spotlight.

headline.seo: In India, Rahul Gandhi Stays Behind the Scenes
headline.main: In Fractious Political Times, a Scion of India’s Dynasty Stays Quiet
headline.print_headline: In Fractious Political Times, a Scion of India’s Dynasty Stays Quiet
